fireballpy.InfoDat

class fireballpy.InfoDat(shells: Dict[int, List[int]], shellsPP: Dict[int, List[int]], cutoffPP: Dict[int, float], cutoffs: Dict[int, List[float]], qneutral: Dict[int, List[float]], wffiles: Dict[int, List[str]], nafiles: Dict[int, List[str]], energy: Dict[int, float])[source]

Class to keep all the info present in the classsical info.dat file, needed for the adjusting the different parameters of each specie in the computation

Methods

load(filename)

Load the information of a InfoDat from a .json file or a .toml file.

save(filename)

Save the information of this InfoDat into a .json file or a .toml file.
__init__(shells: Dict[int, List[int]], shellsPP: Dict[int, List[int]], cutoffPP: Dict[int, float], cutoffs: Dict[int, List[float]], qneutral: Dict[int, List[float]], wffiles: Dict[int, List[str]], nafiles: Dict[int, List[str]], energy: Dict[int, float]) → None
